parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Where, whither, in what place. From hos and pou; what(-ever) where, i.e. At whichever spot.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To go in, come in, enter. From eis and erchomai; to enter.
From oikos; properly, residence, but usually an abode; by implication, a family.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To remain, abide, stay, wait; with acc: I wait for, await. A primary verb; to stay.
(a) there, yonder, in that place, (b) thither, there. Of uncertain affinity; there; by extension, thither.
A conjunction, preposition and adverb of continuance, until.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To go out, come out. From ek and erchomai; to issue.
Thence, from that place. From ekei; thence.
